<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataSR extends data { const CODE = 'SR'; const PREFIX = 597; const REGION = 'South America'; const PATTERNS = array( '(?:[2-5]|68|[78]\d)\d{5}', ); const TYPES = array( '(?:2[1-3]|3[0-7]|(?:4|68)\d|5[2-58])\d{4}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '(?:7[124-7]|8[125-9])\d{5}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '56\d{4}'=>array( 'voip', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})'=>'$1-$2-$3', '(\d{3})(\d{3})'=>'$1-$2', '(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1-$2', ); }
